assertion: I once set fire to my house with a box of fireworks.
When I'm stressed I take a water-free bath.
When we were at school together we hid a dictaphone in the ceiling to confuse the teacher.
He is my old teacher.  We met in a caf√© and I had to pretend to not be me as I was preparing a character.
His hawk was supposed to land on my arm, and instead stole the wig off the man next to me.
This is my cat cam.  I put it around my cat's neck for a week because I believed he was turning the kitchen tap on.
I can balance a banknote on my nose.
